data.comment: The match has started.
In Pachuca de Soto Toluca drive forward through Alan Medina. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 2, Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Alan Medina (Toluca) has received a yellow card from Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Toluca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
Toluca's Carlos Cisneros gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Throw-in Toluca.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
In the minute 17, Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Victor Davila for Pachuca gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
In the minute 18, Toluca have a goal kick.
In Pachuca de Soto Pachuca attack through Victor Davila. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
In the minute 22, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Pachuca.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 25, The match at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo has been interrupted briefly for a check on Victor Davila, who is down injured.
Victor Davila has recovered and rejoins the match in Pachuca de Soto.
Pachuca's Felipe Pardo breaks free at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 28, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Toluca a goal kick.
Throw-in for Toluca in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a throw-in for Pachuca, close to Toluca's area.
In the minute 30, Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Throw-in high up the field for Pachuca in Pachuca de Soto.
Toluca have a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Pachuca throw-in in Toluca's half.
Gustavo Cabral for Pachuca gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
Toluca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Pachuca.
In the minute 38, Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 40, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Toluca a goal kick.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Toluca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 41, Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
In the minute 44, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
Pachuca push forward at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo and Victor Davila gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Toluca defence.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Pachuca have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
The first-half has come to a close in Pachuca de Soto.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Pachuca's Luis Chavez is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick Toluca.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
In Pachuca de Soto Pachuca attack through Victor Davila. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
In the minute 49, Can Toluca capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Toluca pushes forward through Rubens Sambueza, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Pachuca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Toluca's half?
In the minute 51, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
Pachuca's Victor Guzman has been booked in Pachuca de Soto.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Pachuca a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Pachuca are caught offside.
Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
Pachuca to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
In the minute 57, Pachuca's Victor Davila breaks free at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Toluca.
In the minute 59, Toluca have a goal kick.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 61, It's a goal kick for the home team in Pachuca de Soto.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 65, Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Throw-in for Pachuca close to the penalty box.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to William da Silva for Toluca who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 71, Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
In the minute 72, Pachuca's Rodrigo Salinas Dorantes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
The home team replace Felipe Pardo with Romario Ibarra.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Toluca.
In the minute 74, Toluca’s William da Silva is on his feet again at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Important block from the Toluca defence as Luis Chavez fires in a strike for Pachuca.
Free kick Pachuca.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
Can Pachuca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toluca's half?
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Toluca.
Jose Manuel De la Torre (Toluca) is making a first substitution, with Kevin Castaneda replacing Carlos Cisneros.
At Estadio Miguel Hidalgo, Toluca are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in for Toluca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 80, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At Estadio Miguel Hidalgo, Kevin Castaneda has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 82, Pachuca's Luis Chavez gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Toluca defender.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
The home team have replaced Luis Chavez with Leonardo Ramos. This is the second substitution made today by Paulo Pezzolano.
In the minute 83, Roberto de la Rosa is on a sub for Victor Davila for Pachuca.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Jose Manuel De la Torre is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo with Adrian Mora replacing William da Silva.
Enrique Triverio is replacing Michael Estrada for Toluca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Toluca make their fourth substitution with Joao Plata replacing Alan Medina.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Toluca.
Ball safe as Toluca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Toluca in the half of Pachuca.
Rubens Sambueza for the away team is judged to be offside.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Toluca throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Toluca to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
Pachuca are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Paulo Pezzolano (Pachuca) is making a third substitution, with Cristian Souza replacing Victor Sosa.
